# Presenters {-}

## Tim Errington {-}

Tim Errington is Senior Director of Research at the Center for Open Science.

## Maurie Kelly {-}

[Maurie Kelly](https://iee.psu.edu/people/maurie-kelly) is Director of the Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access program, an instructor in the Smeal School of Business and the College of Information Science and Technology, and Director of the Penn State [Data Commons](https://www.datacommons.psu.edu).

## Sarah Rajtmajer {-}

[Sarah Rajtmajer](https://ist.psu.edu/directory/smr48) is an assistant professor in the [College of Information Sciences and Technology](https://ist.psu.edu) at Penn State University and core faculty at Penn State's Rock Ethics Institute. Her work leverages machine learning and mathematical modeling to understand trust and confidence in information.
